End of support versions

The following versions are no longer supported.

version Operator version Operator channel Kafka version shipped Container platform Systems Data storage
10.2.1-eus

(Event Streams product version 10.2.1)

2.2.6 v2.2 2.6.3 Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform versions:
- 4.6 only (any fix level)

OpenShift on cloud infrastructure (IaaS):
- IBM Cloud
- Microsoft Azure
- Amazon Web Services		 - Linux 64-bit (x86_64) systems
- Linux on IBM z13 (s390x) or later systems		 If you want to set up persistent storage, requires block storage configured to use the XFS or ext4 file system.
The use of file storage (for example, NFS) is not recommended.

For example, you can use one of the following systems:

- Kubernetes local volumes
- Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS)
- Rook Ceph
- Red Hat OpenShift Container Storage

(Event Streams product version 10.2.1)

Important: The end of support (EoS) date for Helm-based releases was 30 April 2022. For more information, see announcement letter.

  • Helm-based releases on Red Hat OpenShift platforms
  • Helm-based releases on legacy container platforms
